title: Astro Duel 2
notes: Native controller support **Decky Plugin: Works out of the box**. **2.0 Standalone: Works out of the box**.
description: Astro Duel 2 is a sci-fi combat game combining top-down space dog fights with up-close platforming action. Whether versus or co-op, battle through space and on foot at the same time! Strike within the fully-destructible arenas or just nuke â€˜em from orbit.
